Markdown.pl <<'EOF' <style>body { font: 12px 'Lucida Grande' }</style> # Help for SQL bundle
The _MySQL Query_ command takes the selected text or current line and submit it as a query to mysql. It assumes that the `mysql` command line program is already in your `$PATH`. Using the `--html` flag the output from the query is formated and displayed in an HTML window.
The command assumes the following environment variables are properly set:
* `$MYSQL_USER` — defaults to the value of `$USER` * `$MYSQL_PWD ` — no default * `$MYSQL_HOST` — defaults to localhost if not set * `$MYSQL_PORT` — defaults to 3306 if not set * `$MYSQL_DB ` — no default
These variables may be set in the parent shell of TextMate, global variables in TextMate preferences, or as project local variables. EOF
